attributes.action: scrap the idea of the lexus lane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This idea has been researched in the U.S and found not suitable due to the environmental implications as the other lanes would be more congested and causing an increase in Co2 emmisions. 

Also if this was implimented this would make it dangerous if a vehicle was to break down and create a divide even further sociologically between the working class and the upper working class.
